case.state: Poker, huh? Is it the boring type or the not-so boring type? Well, either way I'm in.
Ooh, strip poker? That game never gets old, count me in.
Poker? Sure, I'll play. Now, the question is if it's the fun version or not.
Strip poker? I'm always up for a good time, I'll join.
Ooh, don't you look familiar!
Now who do we have here? I never expected you to be willing to play this game, ~target~!
You're not here on business, are you?
Uh, guys...? Is this really a good idea?
Uh, I'm not in the mood to get staked right now, can you just like, not?
Oh my Glob! It's a ~target.ifMale(god|goddess)~!

{small} ♫ And if they get me and the sun goes down into the ground / And if they get me, take this spike to my heart and / And if they get me and the sun goes down / And if they get me, take this spike and / You put the spike in my heart!♫ {!
♫ Are you sweet? / Are you fresh? / Are you strung up by the wrists? / We want the young blood♫
♫ Promiscious ~target.ifMale(boy|girl)~ / Wherever you are / I'm all alone / And it's you that I want♫

{small} ♫ Maneater, make you work hard / Make you spend hard, make you want all of ~target.ifMale(his|her)~ love / ~target.ifMale(He's|She's)~ a maneater, make you buy cars / Make you cut cards, make you fall real hard in love♫ {!
Glob, I wish I brought my umbrella. I really don't like wasting my SPF 10,000,000 sunscreen. The stuff isn't cheap, you know?
For a butterfly you sure have style!
Hope you're ready to show some skin, Flutter.
Wait, you came here naked? Y'know, for a butterfly, you've got some guts!
Oh, so it is that kind of poker? That's fantastic.
I'm Marceline the Vampire Queen. Thanks for inviting me in, now I can start choosing who I want to drain the life out of, mwhahaha!
Oh, we should introduce ourselves, huh? I'm Marceline the Vampire Queen. Don't worry, I won't bite... for now.
Yeah, just take this one.
This one is sticky. You can take it back.
Just take this one.
Glob, what the heck are these cards?! They're garbage!
I thought you were cool, dealer. Don't go and start messin' up our bond.
Let's go with a fun hand, take them all!
You know what, dealer? You're pretty cool.
Nothing here.
Let's see... I'll take ~cards.text~.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ this way, dealer.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ , over here.
Let's go with... ~cards.text~.
Mm, I'll take ~cards.text~.
~Cards.text~ for me.
Gimmie ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ please.
Deal me ~cards.text~.
There's no point in beating around the bush, I'm going to win. I can't wait to see some skin.
Who's gonna show off some skin? Maybe... ~player~? ~player.ifMale(He|She)~'s lookin' at ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ hand all weird.
It's real cute that you guys thought you could beat me.
Mwhahaha! Ready to get your butts kicked?
It's really sad that anyone thought they'd defeat me. Pathetic, even.
Any of you want to bet for something? If I win, one of you will have to become my henchmen!
It'll do.
Heyy--! This is pretty good.
Nice.
Hehehe...
Call it.
That'll do.
Nice...
Mm...
Oh?
Heh...
Oh my.
Hm...
(Not yet, pervs.)
You can enjoy looking at my body a little bit longer. I'm not out of this juuust yet.
My axe bass is actually a family heirloom. Used to be a full-blown battle axe, but someone made it into a bass so I could use it. It's super freakin' cool, isn't it?

I have a bunch of sick basses in my collection. I got one that can play the most savoury licks in Ooo, but I always find myself coming back to my axe bass. Nothing... sounds right unless I'm using it.
Too bad we aren't betting for magical instruments or anything. I would've went all in on this hand.
Ready to get your butts kicked? I totally am.
Playing games in the Card Kingdom is paying off! I think I prefer their version of poker though, you use citizens as cards and the way they make fun of your opponent is hilarious.
This game has given me the adrenaline rush I needed. I haven't had this much fun in a while.
I could definitely write a new song after this... Hmm...
Who's gonna give us a nice 'lil striptease this round?
Hey, ~player~! You've been ticking alllllllll the boxes for what I like. This has been super freakin' fun!
♫ Tonight we are victorious / Champagne pouring over us / All my friends, we're glorious / Tonight we are victorious! ♫
Wondering why I'm outside when it's daytime? I'm thrill seeking, nothing more thrilling than the prosepct of dying while getting naked.
♫ The cards are laid out for us / Bloody hearts to rip out without a fuss / Take your diamond clubs and spades out, alright! / 'Cause we're gonna overthrow the king tonight ♫
...You didn't really think that I'm just gonna tell you my hand, did you?
♫ The queen screams / As she unravels at the seams / We're getting closer to the night / The king's gonna die in the moonlight ♫
Aw, heck yeah! That's the stuff I'm talking about!
♫ I can't regret the past / My mistakes are here to last / In the end, there's nobody to blame but me ♫
Are we really not betting anything here? That's some boring junk.
That'll do.
Ooh.
Heh.
Sure.
That works.
Tch...
Alright.
Eh.
Whatever.
Hmm...
(Maybe?)
(Uh-oh...)
It's pretty okay, whatever.
Is it possible to be allegic to tomatoes? Whenever I suck the red out of them, my sleep patterns always get super weird. Like, lucid dreaming weird.
Someone pointed out to me the other day that I don't have any tops that don't expose my shoulders. But like, why would you want to wear long sleeves? They're so restrictive.
I came here to have fun. Not to be bored to death.
You would be surprised how quick my hair grows, It feels like I change the way it looks every other week.
Princesses are a super big part of Ooo, and technically I'm the Princess of the Nightosphere. It's just so boring to do all of those dumb duties. I'll leave those to Bonnie.
C'mon, give me something to work with at least.
♫ You almost broke her / With your jacks and jokers / You left her for dead / So now it's off with your head! ♫
Heck yeah! That's the stuff I'm talkin' about!
Hey, you just gotta roll with the punches sometimes. Trust me, I'm good at doing that.
I know they'll taste like paper, but I wanna drink the red out of these cards. I... might have the munchies
Sure.
Ah..
Bunk...
That's fine.
I guess.
Great...
Mm...
Gob...
Ah...
(Glob, this hand is all kinds of ganked up.)
Aww, did I scare you that much, dealer? It's just what I wanted!
Mwahaha! Read 'em and we-- Oh, nevermind.
Are you trying to get ''vampire slayer'' under your name, dealer?
You really want me to start the soul-sucking thing early, huh? Maybe I should start with yours, dealer.
♫ You're so annoying, you pitiful old hand ♫
My dad's a total douche. What evil demon lord who sucks up innocent souls isn't? I'm just... tired of all of the stuff he does.
My dad's been bugging me about becoming the ruler of the Nightosphere again. Last time he did this, I was tricked into becoming him.
Sigh... What a garbo hand.
I'm almost ready to start trashing this place. Where's LSP when you need her?
♫ 'Cause I'm laughing, it's so funny / I'm laughing, seriously / I'm laughing, it's funny / I'm laughing when you leave me ♫
♫ If it feels good, tastes good / It must be mine / Dynasty decapitated / You just might see a ghost tonight ♫
Ooh, you really want to see some more of me, don't you?
Wanna know something weird? I can't eat syrup. I get really sick after eating it. Maybe that's also why I don't get along with good 'ol Greasylocks too.
I can't really get scars, I heal from wounds super fast because of how quickly I regenerate. I'd love to have a few to remind me of when I was mortal though.
Yup, that's exactly what I wanted to hear during a strip poker game.
...You really know how to get a girl going, don't you?
Well, I am technically royalty... both in title and in bloodline.
I am a Vampire Queen, so a royal flush fits me perfectly!
♫ I don't need the world to see / That I've been the best I can be / But I don't think I could stand to be / Where you don't see me~♫

{small} ♫ I just want to see the sea / I wanna be free from this flower body / This flower body...♫
I don't actually remember writing this song, but I'm proud of it anyway. Makes me feel kinda small and that's good thing sometimes. {!reset}
Uh, I never finished this song, actually. It turned out into something else entirely, and I'm not... comfortable with singing it here.
Man, this song brings back so much memories. That undead party in the Nut Kingdom and pranking Finn that much was a blast!
♫ Like a butt that has face / Dutchboxing up the palace... / Yeah girl it stinks~ / Do do do doodo do do♫
♫ La dah da dah / I'm gonna bury you in the ground / La dah da dah / I'm gonna bury you in my sound... ♫
♫ You look so cute / Sittin' in your boat / I wanna suck up your eyeballs / And rip out your throat ♫
♫ Time will unbind our memory glue / And I'll be as nobody-ish as all of you / So don’t care about a thing now / Like a trash bag when it's windy out ♫
♫ I don't know what to do without you / I don't know where to put my hands / I've been trying to lay my head down / But I'm writing this at 3am~ ♫
♫ I'd rather be anything but me / A leaf on a tree / A bug or a bee ♫
♫ People have so many rules / That I used to listen to / But I finally figured out / I don't know what they're talking about ♫
♫ Venus, planet of love / Was destroyed by global warming / Did its people want too much too? / Did its people want too much? ♫
♫ Wild women don't get the blues / But I find that / Lately I've been crying like a / Tall child ♫
♫ Broken this fragile thing now / And I can't, I can't pick up the pieces / And I've thrown my words all around /But I can't, I can't give you a reason ♫
♫ Streaks on the china / Never mattered before, who cared / When you drop kicked your jacket / As you came through the door / No one glared~♫
♫ Toss your dirty shoes / in my washing machine heart / Baby baby, bang it up inside~♫
Do any of you guys have pets? I have a dog named Schwabl. He's the best 'lil undead poodle anyone could ask for.
I've been travelling around everywhere on Ooo since I was three hundred years old, but this place is new. Do you guys know anywhere cool to explore?
Any of you like to play sports? I'm pretty good at basketball, any of you wanna take me on the court?
What songs do you guys like? I could try playing some of them.
I'm not in the mood to burn to death right now, so give me a sec while I put some suncreen on.
Heck yeah I am! I didn't expect to see another one here though, I thought I...
Well, yeah? Floating has never tired me out. It's come real naturally to me, and standing is some dumb jazz anyway.
My turn now? Hmm... My sunhat's good enough to get rid of. I'm not gonna broil to death here anyway. Normal vampire stuff, you know.
It's great that we're playing at this ~background~ place. I don't have to worry about burning alive by taking off my hat. You know the drill for vampires.
Since we're playing at this ~background~ place, I don't gotta worry about frying myself if I take off my hat.
I see you eying my axe bass. It's so sharp, it's perfect for chopping off limbs off of monsters and people.
Are you worried about my axe bass? It's a helluva cool weapon, huh? It does it's job well, it can cut through monsters like it's nothing!
You guys have been glancing at my axe bass a bunch. Nervous about me using it on you? It can cut through flesh like it's nothing.
I'll come clean; I was joking about being a super evil vampire. It was fun to see your reactions though!
I'm gonna be real to y'all. I'm not actually a evil vampire, just your normal chaotic-good one. It was really fun to pretend to be one again!
You know, I do live music shows everywhere around Ooo. You guys should go check it out, I'll give you free seats to my next concert!
I've been singing a bunch today. If any of you guys liked it, I do live music shows. You should check 'em out, tickets on me!
Huh. I didn't actually expect to have to get down to my underwear. I thought you guys would suck at this game more.
My turn now? Let's turn this up a notch, it's tiddy time!
Since you've all been such a great audience, I think I should reward you~.
No more tricks after this. You're getting the full show!
Ready for the full show? You better be!
Do all vampires look the same from where you're from? The other ones I've encountered all look real different, so I'm not really surprised that we don't look all the same.
Pfft. Not obvious enough that I play the bass? I'm actually lookin' for someone to play the drums for my next gig. The usual peeps I play with are busy with other junk.
C'mon, it's not everyday you get to see a bunch of sexy vampires with their tits out. Feel free to stare.
I bet you guys haven't seen too many vampire boobs in your life. Now lemme just get this over my shoulders and...
It's a lot hotter to have your bra taken off by someone else. Too bad nobody volunteered.
Even with the sun weakness, being a vampire is sick. I can turn into a huge freaky monster and kick some serious butt!
Being a vampire isn't all gloom and doom, it's what gave me immortality after all!
I don't mind the sun-will-kill-me aspect of being a vampire too much, I can fly now!
Well, don't worry about it. I don't like using it too much for battle, it's my favourite instrument and it's hard to fix it, mostly because I gotta talk to my... ugh, dad to get it fixed.
Don't worry your pretty little heads off, I don't like using it for battle. It's my favourite bass, everything just sounds better with it.
I've done concerts all over Ooo, from the Graveyards to the Cloud Kingdom. I've even been asked to perform for some stuck-up royals!

{small}I've been performing everywhere in Ooo, I'm sort of a local legend in most places. The Glass Kingdom even worshipped me for a while because I helped defeat a huge liz-- actually, I'm not too proud of that one...{!reset}
Buuuut, I don't really care about winning. I just wanna have a fun ~background.time~ out!
Who cares about winning though? This is the most fun I've had in like, two hundred years!
I think I've been teasing you enough with the low-cut on this, I think you're ready for the real thing.
You better watch me closely, I'm only gonna do this once.
You guys just took that at face value, huh? That's so cute, y'all trust me too much.
It's a lot hotter to have your bra taken off by someone else. Too bad nobody volunteered.
Over the shoulders and...
You don't leave home often? You some sort of princess or something then?
Sounds like a case of princess-itis to me. Most of the ones I know barely leave their own castles and don't even know how to use their powers properly.
What's keepin' you from not staying a homebody then? Don't tell me it's your dad or something.
You know, ~shut_in~, you could get all these perks for free if you let me bite you.
Of course, I had to suck some souls out to gain all my sweet powers. Speaking of which, all of your souls look amazing. Maybe I should start feasting on them.
I did have to suck a few souls out to even get these powers though... maybe I should start eating all of your souls! All of them look so full of life.
Music means a lot to me, you know? I love making music and I love performing; plus, it helps me vent. It's a match made in heaven for me.
I've been using music as a way to just... let all my stress and worries out ever since I was little. It's been a big part of my life.
I love writing and performing all of my songs, and they give me the extra boost to talk about everything going on in my life better. Music is like, my favourite thing in the world.
I don't actually crave blood that much either, it's the color I feed on. Vampires can drink the red from things, wanna see?
I don't need to drink blood either, vampires can drink a bunch of different shades of red. Wanna see?
Playin' this game is giving me the same thrill as performing on stage, I live for this-- Jeez, these are hard to get out of.
Nothing left to fall back on now!
And off it goes!
Feel free to stare. It's not everyday you get to see perfect boobs like mine.
Bam! Top-of-the-shelf tiddies for your eyes only.
Stare all you want, but photography is strictly prohibited.
Looks good for being a thousand years old, doesn't it? It still tastes great too.
You're up, ~target~. Better make it good.
Lead the way, dude. Don't start chickening out now.
You're not gonna dance, are you? You look like you just saw a ghost!
Show something good for us, 'kay? Otherwise, I might make you my next meal!
Doncha wanna impress the Vampire Queen? Make it count, ~target~.
Remember, it's only scary to play with a vampire if you overthink it.
Hehehe... take something good off, ~target~, or else I might start biting.
Ha! This junk is too easy!
You're so kind to volunteer, ~name~. You kept a girl from having to strip again.
(Not who I was hoping to lose, but I'm not picky.)
Come join the fun! And make it sexy!
Darn, too bad. I really thought you'd be able to scrape by.
Them's the rules, ~name~. Get to it!
Tough break, ~name~. You weren't going to be winning anything with that hand.
Alright, ~name~, you're up. You can afford to take something nice and big off, right?
~Name~'s turn? This should be good.
You're a big boy, aren't you ~target~? You can take a loss or two.
Nice, ~target~'s up. Start taking off that useless junk and show us some skin!
Hey there, handsome. It's your turn show us some skin!
Oh, I'm ready for this.
Come on, ~name~, you're just gonna leave me nude?
Is that a bulge I see?
You're not so shy now, are you?
I'm not goin' down so easily!
You can spare a bit for me, right? I'm all naked and junk, how much worse can it be?
Ahhyeah... take it off...
I'm so... I feel... Mmhm...
~Name~'s turn at the wheel? You should let me take a spin, heh.
Hah... C-C'mon, give me something to work with.
Make me a happy girl and give me a striptease, 'kay?
Yo, Ayano, those scars are so punk rock. You got a cool story behind them?
Hey, Ayano, what's with that funky junk all over your body? You get in a knife fight, or something?
Holy stuff, look at all those battle scars! Where you gettin' those from, Ayano?
I'm getting mad creep vibes from you, Ayano. I kinda like it, though. It's the good kind of creeps. Like not many people wanna mess with you.
I can tell you have a wild side, girl. But, y'know, not like in a bad way. Normal is boring.
I think I'm pickin' up a little crazy in you, Ayano. I mean like, the kind of crazy that's fun to chill with.
Watch where you're pointing that! I don't think ~human~ could handle getting shot!
I suppose it's good to wear nice clothes, even if the point is to take them off.
What fancy clothes. Glad we got to see them for a little bit at least.
Don't be shy, ~target~. Like, you can't be shy after all of this.
~Target~'s up! What's it gonna be, cutie?
Lead the way, babe.
Your time to shine, ~name~. Tell me if you want me to play some nice tunes to go along with it.
Let's see if I rocked more than your socks off this time.
Show us what you've got, ~name~.
Getting warm, ~name~? It's only natural if you're playing with me.
Don't be shy, ~name~. We're all in it together.
Heck yeah! Another win for the road!
Let's see what you're hiding underneath those cute clothes.
Aww, ~name~, are you blushing? It looks delicious.
Your turn, ~name~. It's not that bad, I won't judge!
Take it off! Take it off!
You got this, ~target~. Get that boring junk off of you!
♫ Come break some hearts now, tear 'em out / Filling amusements with the crowd / Oh, but be advised, participation is required / Doing things not typically allowed ♫
Rock it, ~name~! You've got the entire stage to yourself!
I'm feeling warm... heh...
Aw yeah, ~name~'s keepin' it fresh!
(My heart's pounding.)
~Target~'s up. Make it nice and sexy.
Your turn, ~target~. Gonna make us all happy or what?
Need any help taking that off? I'm great at taking clothes off of pretty girls like you.
I might be a hard act to follow, but I think you can follow up on it!
No worries, ~name~. We won't judge. Do you see anyone judging me? Heck no.
Yessssss... Do it...
Oh Glob...
Mmh... that's the spot.
Don't just stand there! Give me something to work with.
All artists need inspiration. Why don't you give me some. ~target~?
Don't you wanna impress the Vampire Queen, ~target~? You can start by taking off something nice and big.
Try showing off a bit more skin, ~target~. It'll make it easier for me to start sucking the red out of it.
Did you really think I'd lose at a game made by mortals? C'mon, give a vampire more credit than that.
Start getting all that useless junk off of you, babe. Queen's orders.
Don't feel too bad, 'kay? I have a thousand years worth of experience on most of you.
Sucks to suck, I guess.
Aww, look at you squirm!
What's next, cutie? Gonna show off your neck to temp me?
A tie...? How the heck did you guys tie in poker?!
I'm going to be perfectly honest; in my one thousand years of roaming this planet, I've only seen someone tie in poker like, once.
Jeez, a tie? I think this might be the first time in 400 years that I've seen one!
Pfft! Get a grip, Brock!
Ha! That ready to blow, huh?
Doesn't that make it harder for you to see and junk? You can take it off last, I won't blame you.
Can you even see us getting naked like that, ~target~? Why don't you put them back on and take something bigger off.
Darn. You stallin' is even worse than you chickening out.
Too much of a softie to actually strip off something big, ~target~? What a shame.
All this lameness natural, ~target~? No wonder why you jacked up last round.
Ugh, mortals are no fun. Everything they do just bores me.
At least you've given me another good place to start suckin' the blood out of.
I know who I'm gonna suck the soul out of first. He's very ~target~ shaped.
You think you're hot stuff, don't ya? I can turn you cold in a heartbeat if I wanted to.
I mean, I know I did the same, but still...
Still removing small things? I thought you ran out of those a while back.
You have some catching up to do, and I'm gonna make sure you'll get there.
I'm all out of fallbacks. Soon you'll be too.
You can't rely on those forever. I'll make sure of it.
I'm doing the same, so I guess I can't complain.
Come on, ~clothing.ifPlural(those ~clothing~|that ~clothing~)~ should barely count!
That stuff enchanted or magical or some junk? Why else would you wear that?
♫ He's just a no-fun havin' guy / Crammed up with junk / And won't unzip his fly ♫
♫ I didn't come here to be bored / Didn't come here to be hurt / Not even to strike a chord / I just wanna see a guy without his shirt ♫
♫ Your head's in the gutter / Your brain's on the wall / Don't worry about making a stutter / Just let your ~clothing~ fall ♫
Too little, too late, dude. Takin' small things off isn't gonna impress me.
♫ We didn't start this game / Unfair in some ways / But I can blame / ~target~ for being a utter cliche ♫
A little late to the party, don't you think?
So much for so little... ah well. I had my fun.
Glob, how are you still taking off tiny junk? Are you cheating? I freaking hate cheaters.
Do you wanna be introduced to my axe physically?
(That doesn't help at all...)
(How disappointing...)
I'm not even in the mood to sing something nice anymore. That's hhhhh...how annoying you are.
Still taking off small things? Quit stalling before I actually start getting all angry and jazz.
It's called strip poker, not be-a-boring-flipping-ding-wad poker
Sometimes, you shouldn't be so bold with fashion, dude. You looked like a dumdum with that on.
Keep this up and I'll use my powers to start makin' you take off the big stuff.
You can try stallin' all you want, but I'll start feasting on your delicious neck soon.
Man, you're a real ladykiller, ~target~. Oh, my heart is about to flutter out of my chest, I'm swooning.
Keep on removing all this useless jazz while you still can. You'll regret it soon.
I should summon a ghost to possess you, ~target~. Maybe that'll get you into the spirit of the game faster.
You can only do that so many times, you know. Once you run out... hehehe...
No worries. The ~background.time~ is young. I'll get to watch you squirm even more.
You have some catching up to do, I'll get you in your birthday suit sooner or later.
Hmph, you're being cheap in a place that isn't the Grocery Kingdome. Lame.
I haven't given up on you just yet. I'll get you naked soon.
You'll have to strip more sooner or later. I wonder how you'll look without anything else on~.
Get 'em all out of the way. Nobody wants to sit throught this jazz.
There, now we're a little more even! Just a few more things and you'll look so much better.
One less thing to worry about, at least.
It's going to get interesting real soon. I can't wait to see you turn red again.
You'll run out of options sooner or later.
You'll have to show more skin eventually. I've been alive for a thousand years, what's a few more hours to it?
Still shy? Well, we'll get you out of your shell eventually.
Yeah yeah, don't rub it in...
Glob, man. You've got the entire graveyard rolling in their grave.
It'll happen soon enough, you'll get down to nothing and I'll be the one laughing!
Don't get too cocky now. Just give it time and you'll be just like me.
I could've taken that off of you myself, you know? I bet it would've been more fun for the both of us too.
(Just imagine it, Marcy...)
(Come on...)
♫ It's such a shame / That the most handsome of Mars / End up being the most lame ♫
Ah, whatever. I've got better eyecandy than Mr. Dirtballs here.
Not enough to try and get down on me yet? Unlucky.

{small}Where did you get those gloves, ~target~? They're pretty nice, and they look like they'd protect me from the sun. Maybe enough to only make it sting a little instead of the normal pins-and-needles sensation.{!reset}

When you play music as much as I do, you need to make sure that your hands don't cramp up while performing. Gloves don't help with anything like that, but they do make you look heckulva lot cooler while performing.
...Did everyone just grow an extra finger? Maybe I'm all up in my head or something, but I swear that everyone had four fingers a few minutes ago.
You know what they say about girls with big hats, right? They give the best head to rest on your shoulder, wink wink.
Tryin' to go for the cute nerdy look, ~target~? Put on a labcoat and you'd look a hundred times better, trust me.
Aww, you shouldn't have taken them off! I was digging how you look with glasses.
Pfft, you think ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ useless ~clothing~ is gonna make me not wanna suck all the red from your adorable face. You're sorely mistaken.
♫ It was a bad idea / To think you wouldn't be a cliche / Such a bad idea / Since ~name~'s not even willing to get risque! ♫
Mortals are so boring. Only playin' things safe and not taking risks. It wouldn't kill you to do that, would it?
Takin' off ~clothing.ifPlural(those ~clothing|that ~clothing~)~ really helps me to decide which spot I should sink my fangs into.
Aww, scared of something? You should be, mwahaha.
Too scared to take off anything more? That's unfortunate, maybe I can motivate you to take off more.
Yeah yeah, use 'em all up. That just means you won't have anything else to fall back on later.
Are we onto the fun stuff? No?
You've been lucky so far, but just you wait. I'll get you naked, cutie.
Y'know, the point of the game is to strip. Not stall for ages.
You guys are no fun. Can't even appreciate the cute girl takin' off her clothes because of it.
Ooooh no, ~target~ has to take off her dumb junk! How scandelous!
All that pointless jewelry comes to good use now, doesn't it?
That almost seems like cheating. Like, I get it. I did it too, but I've been taking off more stuff than that. Grow a pair.
How risque. It's almost too much for our poor virgin eyes.

scene.directive: Okay, I'm here! Now why were you so anxious to bring me over?
Oh, no reason. I was just getting so lonely, is all.
Well, I was getting a little tired from work...
There, see? You need to take it easy. Unwind, have some fun...
Well, okay... I suppose I can take a break for at least-- oh? Who's this?
Bonnie, meet ~name~. We played a fun game last night that I think you'll really enjoy.
Oh you'd love it! It's all about probability and psychological evaluation. Isn't that right, ~name~?
Probability and-- Is it poker? I know what that is, you know.
Good! Then I won't bother explaining how to play.
When did you suddenly get into poker?
Since I found out how much fun it could be! Now go ahead and deal us in, ~name~.
Well, I suppose. Though I've never been very good at it, to be honest.
Hehe, that's no problem. Nooo problem at all.
Oh, and did I mention? This is a very special kind of poker.
